main.name: Sarwar Dinar
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React/Next.Js
main.bio: Hi there! I am Sarwar and a highly skilled Electrical Technician with expertise in precise electrical assembly, soldering, and wiring. Proficient in operating Wire Terminal Crimping Machines, he excels in repairing cable assemblies, showcasing a deep understanding of electronic components. Committed to safety, Sarwar holds WHMIS certification and maintains clean work environments. His versatility extends to warehouse operations, customer service, and machine operation, demonstrating strong organizational skills. Equipped with a Class 5 driver's license and a personal car, he ensures efficient transportation. With diverse professional experiences, including roles at KS2 Corp INC and Home Depot Canada, Sarwar is detail-oriented, versatile, and fluent in English, Hindi, and Bangla.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the web develop!

education.degree: Secondary School Diploma (Verified by World Education Services, March, 2023)

work.title: Electronics Assembler
work.description: Electrical Technician Expertise: Proven experience in electrical assembly, soldering, and wiring, with afocus on precision and adherence to assembly drawings and blueprints.

testimonials.text: Sarwar is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
I worked with Sarwar has been AWESOME, he makes code React/next.Js so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
